channel.title: Buffer overlow
channel.description: Hey when my server is online for a while or even 5 minutes .. this happens[img]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/9071/serrorspecxm5.jpg[/img] Fatal: buffer overflow then it calls some lines in client.java that are from the special attacks like the leethax method. so is it the best for me to remove my special attacs or what? Ps. Then everyone get disconnected and it says already logged in for everyone and my whole computer starts lagging out and i need to restart.

item.title: Buffer overlow
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

You should find out what buffer is being overflowed and solve it…I’d also recommend looking into Exception handling.

Read full topic

item.title: Buffer overlow
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

hehe … i got it from a tut should i remove it

Read full topic

item.title: Buffer overlow
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Where’s the method “133thax(int)” called from?

By the way: Fix your special attack method, for my eyes sake.

Read full topic

item.title: Buffer overlow
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

[code]public int nolagtimer = 0;
public void fsBar(int id1, int id2, int id3)
{
outStream.createFrame(70);
outStream.writeWord(id1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id2);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id3);
}
public void sendFrame230(int i1, int i2, int i3, int i4) {// i2 being negative logs you out, otherwise it doesn’t log you out
outStream.createFrame(230);
outStream.writeWordA(i1);
outStream.writeWord(i2); // interface id?
outStream.writeWord(i3);
outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(i4); // junk? not sure
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void l33thax(int id)
{
outStream.createFrame(171);
//line 13743 outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
flushOutStream();
}

item.title: Buffer overlow
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Hey when my server is online for a while or even 5 minutes …
this happens
Fatal: buffer overflow
then it calls some lines in client.java that are from the special attacks
like the leethax method.
so is it the best for me to remove my special attacs or what?
Ps. Then everyone get disconnected and it says already logged in for everyone
and my whole computer starts lagging out and i need to restart.
